    tokenizer="standard",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "dictionary_decompounder",
            "word_list": [
                "Donau",
                "dampf",
                "meer",
                "schiff"
            ]
        }
    ],
    text="Donaudampfschiff",
)
print(resp)
